I agree 100% with you SF...we are just beginning to emerge from institution=
alized religion and leaning toward independent thinking, as a planet.=A0 Ye=
ars of the "powers that be" grasping for ultimate control disguised as orga=
nized religion has made human beings afraid of free thinking.=A0 The beauti=
ful part about the paranormal movement and related theories on the afterlif=
e is that we can now use scientific instruments to legitimize what we belie=
ve.=A0 I, for one, believe in God, or a supreme being and intelligent desig=
n.....just not the way I was instructed to believe. It's quite comforting t=
o be able to discuss this way of life (and death) with people of the same c=
onvictions.=A0 Im thankful for all of you guys.....even the skeptics that k=
eep us on our toes.

--- On Sun, 10/17/10, SnowfireL@... <SnowfireL@aol=
.com> wrote:


From: SnowfireL@... <SnowfireL@...>
Subject: Re: [EV=

Date: Sunday, October 1=
7, 2010, 12:11 PM









DEJ' EVUES, are cellular memory of our loved one=
s, or guides memory's while on earth when they lived, this universe is far =
to vast a place for souls to return here over and over again, makes no sens=
e really. 16 people could have been related to Cleopatra through cell memor=
y, but they all cannot have been her.=A0 When ones hears about the "long, l=
ong line" going from darkness into the light for all those who may have tho=
ught they were going to reincarnate, to buy Heaven know differently now.=A0=
 There is a such thing as "incarnation" but that is far different from rein=
carnation.=A0 Difference is: with R, they try to buy the way into Heaven, w=
ith In, they are already coming from Heaven down to help on this side for a=
 purpose, not to try to earn brownie points to get into Heaven, they come h=
ere to attach with other spirits in the body to aid in some way, or for a D=
ivine purpose. sf
=A0

In a message dated 10/17/2010 12:58:16 P.M. Eastern =
Standard Time, rickwegrzyn@... writes:
=A0 



I believe in the reinc=
arnation thing cause I've had to many DEJ' EVUES how ever u spell it..lol..=
done alot of traveling and seem to know whats coming down the road before w=
e get there.....That recorder your husband uses,is it digital....





From=
: Adriana Jones <adrianamjones@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent:=
 Sun, October 17, 2010 9:08:01 AM
Subject: [EVP-ITC] A slew of "no"'s

=A0 =


When my husband asked whether or not reincarnation is real, he was met wi=
th a slew of "no"'s. We know better than to believe anything they say one w=
ay or the other, but we do recognize that this is excellent proof of intell=
igent communication... how often do you scan the dial and get like five or =
six "no"'s this close together?

See "reincar-no" file in my folder "Adrian=
a's files" in the files section.
